attributes.action: Reintroduce The 6p Coin Plus Other 6x denominations
attributes.additional_details: Introduce a 6p coin, a 60p coin, a £6 note, a £60 note, a £600 note, a £6000 note and a special £6,000,000,000 note for govt use. The benefit is that people like the number 6 and will be much happier and it will stimulate the economy as business scrambles to reflect the changes, including vending machine operators.
